text: Ra yadi tapa'ile grantha pradana bha'ekaharu samu jati tarkaharurakhe pani tiniharule (yahudi ra isa'i) tapa'iko kiblala'i svikarne chainan ra nata tapa'ile uniharuko kiblala'i svikarne ho ra nata uniharu parasparama eka arkako kiblala'i manne chan. Ra yadi timi aphno che'u jnana a'isake pachi tiniharuko iccha anusara hindchau bhane timi pani an'yayiharumadhyeka hunechau
